Song.title: Hosanna (Praise is Rising)
Song.copyright: Brenton Brown, Paul Baloche?2005, 2006 Integrity's Hosanna! Music | Thankyou Music | (Admin. by EMI Christian Music Publishing)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [G5]Praise is rising Eyes are turning to [C2]You We turn to [G5]You [G5]Hope is stirring Hearts are yearning for [C2]You We long for [G5]You
Pre-chorus: 'Cause when we [D(4)]see You We find [C]strength to face the [G5]day In Your [D(4)]presence All our [C]fears are washed [G5]away Washed [D]away
Chorus: [ Gsus G]Hosanna [ Em7 C2]hosanna You are the [G5]God who saves [ Dsus]us Worthy of [Em7]all our [ C2]praises [ Gsus G]Hosanna [ Em7 C2]hosanna Come have Your [G5]way among [ Dsus]us We welcome You [Em7]here Lord [ C2]Jesus
Verse 2: [G5]Hear the sound of Hearts returning to [C2]You We turn to [G5]You [G5]In Your Kingdom Broken lives are made [C2]new You make us [G5]new
[Instrumental] [Gsus G Em7 C2 G5 Dsus Em7 C2 (G)]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 praise is rising eyes are turning to you we turn to you hope is stirring hearts are yearning for you we long for you prechorus cause when we see you we find strength to face the day in your presence all our fears are washed away washed away chorus hosanna hosanna you are the god who saves us worthy of all our praises hosanna hosanna come have your way among us we welcome you here lord jesus verse 2 hear the sound of hearts returning to you we turn to you in your kingdom broken lives are made new you make us new
